name: PAC-014 (E2)
description:
PAC-014 is a first person horror arcade game with the goal of collecting shining spheres in order to start up the generators and open the doors to the escape pods. You need a certain amount of spheres for each door and you earn a higher score if you complete the level faster. As you collect the orbs the lights go out and the darkness closes in around you.

Made at Stockholm University.
